DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the paient/participant is experiencing weight loss.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the response to an assessment or evaluation of weight loss, a reduction in overall body mass.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A reduction in overall body mass.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A reduction in total body weight.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Response is any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Baseline weight loss <=15% of premorbid weight

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you lost weight involuntarily over the past 6 months?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient present with significant weight loss?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient reported 2-month weight loss of at least 5 pounds (2.3 kilograms) and/or physician-estimated caloric intake of less than 20 calories/kilograms of body weight per day?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient reported 2-month weight loss of at least 5 pounds (2.3 kilograms) and/or physician-estimated caloric intake of less than 20 calories/kilograms of body weight per day?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Quality of Life Ind-2 2018322v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator   - dbw
